changes.change: Now supports Apollo, Twitter, Tweetbot, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram, iCleaner, Filza, Facetime, UICache, Snapchat, Settings, Secret Settings, Screenshot, Safemode, Reboot, Safari, Respring, Chrome, Reboot, Play Music, Phone, Music, Location, Google Authenticator, Facebook, Discord, and Cydia.
